overview:
Bjørn Haugland is a successful Norwegian CEO and serial founder of Feedback Research, Confirmit and Symphonical. He is the chairman of the Norwegian Market Research Association.

Symphonical is like a whiteboard with yellow notes in the cloud for groups making it very easy to collaborate.

Symphonical makes it more fun to get things done, is well suited for both private and business, it gives a great overview and it´s free. With an integration to Google+ Hangout, up to 9 people can now see each other and everybody can see what everybody does, not just screen sharing.

Symphonical is privately held with mainly Norwegian investors.

Confirmit is the leading global software provider for Customer Feedback, Employee Feedback and Market Research.

Confirmit is the world’s leading SaaS vendor for multi-channel Voice of the Customer, Employee Feedback, and Market Research applications.

The company has offices in Oslo (headquarters), Cologne, Guildford, London, Moscow, New York, San Francisco, Vancouver, and Yaroslavl.

Confirmit’s software is also distributed through partner resellers in Barcelona, Kuwait City, Madrid, Milan, Pattaya, Sydney, and Tokyo.

Confirmit targets Global 5000 companies and Market Research agencies worldwide with a wide range of software products for feedback / data collection, panel management, data processing, analysis, and reporting. Customers include British Airways, Dow Chemical, Farmers Insurance, GlaxoSmithKline, Halifax Bank of Scotland, HSBC, Ipsos, Nielsen, The NPD Group, Safeco Insurance, Statoil, Symantec, Virgin Media, and Wells Fargo. Visit www.confirmit.com for more information.

Confirmit was stocklisted on the Oslo Stock Exchange in 2005 and later purchased and is now privately owned by Alexander Vik.

Feedback Research became one of Norways largest market research companies and was aquired by TNS Gallup.
